<file path="/home/janreges/ai-distiller/testdata/kotlin/01_basic/source.kt">
data class User(var id: Long, var name: String, var email: String) {
}
sealed class UserState {
}
String.isValidEmail(): Boolean
var secondOrNull: T
class UserService {
    addUser(user: User): Boolean
    findUserById(id: Long): User?
    getUserState(userId: Long): String
}
enum class UserRole {
    ADMIN(("Administrator", setOf("read", "write", "delete", "manage")))
    MODERATOR(("Moderator", setOf("read", "write", "moderate")))
    USER(("User", setOf("read", "write_own")))
    hasPermission(permission: String): Boolean
}
class UserConstants {
    var MAX_USERNAME_LENGTH
    var MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH
    var ALLOWED_EMAIL_DOMAINS
    isAllowedEmailDomain(email: String): Boolean
}
inline T.applyIf(condition: Boolean, block: T.() -> T): T
main()
</file>
